name: KingGame
description:
Webversion may be bugged or possibly not working, it wasn’t tested enough! Press escape to release the mouse, if it’s captured the game is not playable! Probably I need to take the HTML version down, if too much problems occur. (60 mb to download). There is a downloadable version which should work.

Sacrifices must be made…

You are King Cubic III, emperor of the holy dices.
You have a long journey through the dark and dangerous dungeon.
 In order to avoid dying by yourself, you can sacrifice your loyal cubic servants

Controls:

  • WASD for navigation
  • Hold right mouse button to move camera
  • Press R to call new servants
  • Left-Click to select servant
  • Right-Click to send the selected servant to requested location.

Release information - The long bug list

  • The game might have bad performance on your pc, because of no optimizations and no ingame options.
  • Navigation for servants won’t work properly in some cases. They can easily be blocked or just don’t move.
  • Spawning too many servants, without moving them, will let them get stuck!
  • Platforms at the end of the game sometimes have bad behavior (possibly, you are not able to the finish the game)
  • Glitchy physics on gravestones.

#GL, HF!
